name: WaterBall
description:
WaterBall helps us think about the hunt for clean water and how it gets harder and harder to find around the world. In my game, you will try to make it to the end of each screen without running out of water. This game was made for a game jam named The Heart Jam and the theme was scarcity.

To play the game:

a = move left

d = move right

space = jump
